text:
*Ably is hiring a Marketing Technical Content Writer* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

:hammer_and_wrench: Highly technical writing: our main audiences are Platform, Infrastructure, and Operations Engineers. Knowledge about cloud architectures, software design patterns, and distributed systems is ideal.

:writing_hand: You will create high-quality, short, and long-form pieces, help shape our content strategy and be a key player in making content a growth engine for Ably.

:earth_africa: Remote in Europe (will consider worldwide for the right candidate) with London salary :pound:. You will get to work with and learn from a super talented team. Great benefits and company culture.

Full job description: <https://jobs.ably.com/o/marketing-technical-content-writer-remote-europe>

*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:ramiro.nd@ably.com|ramiro.nd@ably.com>`
